name: Lattice XVL Geometry File
summary: Learn about .XV3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: XV3 files are stored in a highly compressed format. Therefore, they are suitable for insertion into CAD documents and other 3D model documentation.
XV3 files can be viewed in the XVL Player, which is a Web browser plug-in.
NOTE: XV3 files are stored using the Lattice Technology XVL (eXtensible Virtual world description Language) format, which is an XML-based format used for compressing and exchanging 3D models.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
